statements: SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT station_id, location_name, city FROM charging_stations WHERE state='CA';
SELECT city, count(*) as num_of_stations FROM charging_stations GROUP BY city HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE zip_code LIKE '9%';
SELECT location_name, address FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM charging_stations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE zip_code LIKE '94%' ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, zip_code FROM charging_stations WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'California';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_stations FROM charging_stations;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT station_id, location_name, address FROM charging_stations WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT station_id, location_name, longitude FROM charging_stations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking ORDER BY tracked_at DESC;
SELECT station_id, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS num_vehicles FROM vehicle_tracking GROUP BY station_id HAVING num_vehicles > 5;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location_name DESC, longitude ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT station_id, location_name, address FROM charging_stations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE tracked_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tracked_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(tracking_id) AS total_trackings, station_id FROM vehicle_tracking GROUP BY station_id HAVING total_trackings > 2;

SELECT c.station_id, c.location_name, v.tracked_at FROM charging_stations c JOIN vehicle_tracking v ON c.station_id = v.station_id WHERE v.tracked_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY v.tracked_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM charging_stations;
SELECT station_name, num_charging_ports FROM charging_stations WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location_long DESC;
SELECT * FROM station_status WHERE status = 'available';
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE num_charging_ports > 5;
SELECT station_id, station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM charging_stations WHERE location_lat < 40.0;
SELECT station_id, station_name, num_charging_ports FROM charging_stations WHERE num_charging_ports BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT s.station_name, v.vehicle_type, ss.status, ss.timestamp FROM charging_stations s JOIN station_status ss ON s.station_id = ss.station_id JOIN vehicle_types v ON ss.vehicle_id = v.type_id;
SELECT station_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM station_status GROUP BY station_id HAVING count > 5;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM charging_stations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT owner_name, vehicle_model FROM vehicles ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_history WHERE charge_start_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT station_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM charging_stations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_name, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT station_id, location_name FROM charging_stations WHERE station_id IN (SELECT charging_station_id FROM vehicle_history WHERE vehicle_id = 1);
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, h.charge_start_time, h.charge_end_time FROM users u JOIN vehicle_history h ON u.user_id = h.vehicle_id ORDER BY h.charge_end_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, total_chargers FROM charging_stations WHERE operational_chargers > 0;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 50 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT station_id, vehicle_vin, energy_consumed FROM charging_transactions WHERE end_time > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations ORDER BY name DESC, total_chargers ASC;
SELECT id, location, operational_chargers FROM charging_stations WHERE total_chargers > 5;

SELECT users.username, charging_stations.name, charging_transactions.energy_consumed FROM users JOIN charging_transactions ON users.user_id = charging_transactions.user_id JOIN charging_stations ON charging_transactions.station_id = charging_stations.id ORDER BY charging_transactions.energy_consumed DESC;

SELECT vehicles.model, charging_transactions.start_time, charging_transactions.end_time FROM vehicles JOIN charging_transactions ON vehicles.vin = charging_transactions.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicles.manufacturer = 'Tesla' AND charging_transactions.energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_sessions, SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM duration)) AS total_duration_seconds FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY total_duration_seconds DESC;
